title: Mother of Pearl Letters
content:
A coupla more letters that James cut to inlay into a bass guitar fingerboard:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420113610im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_LS_5319.jpg)

The letters are about .625 inches high and hand cut from a slab of mother of pearl with a jeweler's saw.
author: mica

comments.content: The bass these letters are going in can be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420113610/http:/alembic.com/club/messages/631/57651.html?1239322330).
